content: Let's see who will be the winner, me... or <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>?!
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, you're just one step away from victory. Well then, I'll have to give it my all too!
{A摊手}The final score is <style=Highlight>0-2</style>. Sorry, but this time, it's a complete victory for me.
Looks like I'm about to win? <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, shall we continue?

<style=Highlight>2-0</style>?!
I lost so completely, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>,
{A开心}<style=SizeBig>you won. Congrats!</style>
<style=Highlight>2-1</style>, {A开心}so <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, <style=SizeBig>you took the final win. Congrats!</style>
Wait, the final result is <style=Highlight>1-2</style>? Did I actually win?
Five ties in a row?! Our minds seem to be so in sync... Well then...

Rock-paper-scissors, <style=SizeBig>let's begin!</style>
We'll go with the simplest rule: win two out of three!

The score is now 1-1.
Up next is the exciting tiebreaker.
Let's see who will win!
{A拍手}I've made my decision... <style=SizeBig><style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style> wins!</style>
